DOC.brief_summary: The Strength Training Regimen Normal Weight Diabetics ( STRONG-D ) study examine effectiveness different exercise regimen type control diabetes normal weight type 2 diabetes population .
DOC.brief_title: Strength Training Regimen Normal Weight Diabetics
DOC.detailed_description: In STRONG-D study , participant randomly assign strength training , aerobic training combined strength aerobic training group . Participants exercise group attend exercise session course 9 month YMCA . Participants opportunities engage activity educational run-in visit allow measurement hemoglobin A1c emphasize importance exercise improve Type 2 diabetes .
DOC.criteria: Recent hemoglobin A1c result 6.5 % 11 % Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus BMI 18.5 25 kg/m2 Blood pressure < 160/100 Sedentary lifestyle Able willing enroll meet requirement study Age le 30 year great 75 year Type 1 diabetes use insulin pump Triglycerides > 500 mg/dL Use weight loss medication Bariatric surgery Consumes > 14 alcoholic drink per week Pregnancy Plans away four week Medical condition would prevent longterm participation would contraindicate physical activity
